overview: Marietto is a very lively and creative orphaned child, housed in a boarding school of nuns. One day, while browsing a newspaper, he sees a photo of a beautiful opera house dancer, Camilla, and is convinced that she is her mother.

production_companies.name: Societa per L'Esercizio dell'Industria e del Commercio Cinematografico

tagline: A tender, warm, wonderfully funny film that drives straight at your heart!
title: Angel in a Taxi
